trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event occurs after a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>事件发生在关闭窗体，可由用户通过用户界面 (UI)，或以编程方式，通过对等<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>中</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>的方法的调用之后</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体上有任何子或附属窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>也会为每个引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The FormClosedEventArgs class provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>属性提供关闭窗体的原因的原因。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The `closeReason` parameter is used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"></xref> value that represents the reason why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref>值，该值表示该窗体已关闭的原因。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示窗体已关闭的原因。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>可以由于各种原因，用户启动和编程已关闭。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property indicates the reason for the closure.
